data.title: Luxury Apartments in Mid City, Los Angeles, CA
data.meta_description: Explore modern one and two-bedroom apartments with upscale amenities and convenient access to the best of Mid City Los Angeles. Schedule your tour today!
data.text:
Many people have a goal when it comes to apartment hunting: find a luxury apartment in Mid City. Then there is Carthay, an upscale neighborhood nestled right next to Mid City with all the same amenities and upscale surroundings.

Have you ever wondered what it would be like to come home to a brand new, modern one or two bedroom apartment located in one of LA’s most unique neighborhoods? As a resident of Carthay Pacific Apartments, you can!

Carthay Pacific Apartments are available for immediate move-in and feature exclusive, residents-only amenities. At our luxury apartments near Mid City, CA., you will get to enjoy life in an upscale, pet-friendly community that’s unlike any other. With stunning views of the Hollywood Hills, you will be perfectly located for easy access to the best shopping, culture and dining in the city, with the 10 freeway being within fast, easy reach.

If you are looking for Mid City luxury apartments, then look no further than Carthay Apartments located three short miles from Rodeo Drive via Pico Boulevard and Rexford Drive. Our modern, upscale boutique-style apartment building near Mid City is located in one of the most exclusive zip codes in the country. We offer one-bedroom and two-bedroom apartments with several floor plan types to choose from. You will fall in love with the modern aesthetic, open kitchen concepts, stainless steel appliances, and all the high-end finishes that make Carthay Pacific Apartments so desirable. Located within a short walk from the Los Angeles County Museum of Art (LACMA), the Petersen Automotive Museum, the oldest Farmers Market in LA, and Little Ethiopia, you can be rubbing elbows with local trend setters in no time.

Call us today to schedule your personal tour.

Walking into your new luxury apartment, the first thing you’ll notice is the beautiful plank flooring throughout. In the kitchen, stainless steel appliances and over-the-range microwave complement the solid surface countertop with tile backsplash.

Your in-unit tankless water heater is ready for you after a long day; soak in your tub or enjoy your tiled shower in a bathroom with lighted mirror surround and solid surface countertops. Entertain guests inside with central air conditioning, or outside on the sizeable balcony. Need more space? Head out to the BBQ-equipped common area sundeck.

If you’re looking for Mid City apartments with a particular LA charm, Carthay is for you. South Carthay, Carthay Circle, and Carthay Square have all been designated as Los Angeles Historic Preservation Overlay Zones. The architecture of the historic Carthay neighborhood, known as Googie, celebrates the 1950s and 60s with funky, futuristic elements that have unmistakable style.

Our building, designed with the same great look, is a beautiful match with the rest of the neighborhood, and is also attached to one of its oldest eateries, LA Burger. Take your best furry friend for a walk, and you’ll encounter other historical elements, such as the Petersen Automotive Museum, the nearly century-old Original Farmers Market, Little Ethiopia, and so much more.

Your luxury apartments near Mid City, CA are also located right near LA’s oldest music venue, The Mint, where great bands have been playing since 1937. The history, style, convenience, and luxury of Carthay make it a truly unique and unbeatable place to live!

You don’t have to wonder about what living in a luxury one-bedroom or two-bedroom apartment near Mid City in Carthay would be like; you can experience it for yourself when you book your personal tour with a member of our executive management team.

Can’t make it in person? Just book your virtual tour by emailing contact@carthaypacific.net. If you prefer, give our management office a call, and we’ll be happy to schedule your in-person visit at 323-879-9620. We are very excited to meet you and show you around what could be your new home!
